articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening around the world on August 1 - CBC.ca
articles.description: Mexico now has the third-most COVID-19 deaths in the world, behind Brazil and the United States, where a hurricane bearing down on the East Coast on Saturday is threatening to complicate efforts to contain the virus.
articles.content:
The latest:
  • India records steepest spike of new cases with 57,118.
  • South Africa surpasses 500,000 confirmed cases.
  • Saudi Arabia says no COVID-19 cases among Hajj pilgrims.
